programme.title: Benelli Presents: Donnie Vincent’s Winds of Adak
programme.desc: In November of 2019, explorer and hunter Donnie Vincent traveled to Adak Island, Alaska. Located at the westernmost end in the Aleutian chain, Adak is wilderness with the exception of a now-abandoned naval base that once housed more than 6,000 people. Winds of Adak chronicles Donnie’s exploration of the island, a hauntingly desolate abandoned military outpost and three unique hunts—caribou, ptarmigan and sea ducks—as the unforgiving elements, the terrain and the Bering Sea test both man and equipment.

programme.title: Reel West Coast S3:E5 "Northern Rockies Lodge Part One"
programme.desc: Located in the Northernmost part of the Rocky Mountains, Brendan and Blake Sloan get dropped off by bush pilot to different alpine lakes and target 7 different species of fish using all different types of gear and techniques.

programme.title: Fish Addictions S6:E5 "Our Best Jumbo Perch Bite Yet??" pt2
programme.desc: As we told you guys last week, this trip to South Dakota was second to none. If the bucket of Jumbo Perch doesn't tell you that, I don't know what will!

programme.title: Fish Addictions S6:E6 "Crushing Jumbo Perch" Ice Fishing on Unfamiliar Lakes
programme.desc: Welcome to Part 1 of a 2 part Jumbo Perch search. Mike and the guys are excited for some ice fishing on unfamiliar lakes with their sights on crushing jumbo perch. Fish Addictions Staff members Taylor and Anthony put in a TON of research to find the lakes with not only the best current up to date netting/stocking reports but also the best potential for some quality jumbos.

programme.title: Fish Addictions S6:E7 "Crushing Jumbo Perch" Ice Fishing on Unfamiliar Lakes pt 2
programme.desc: Part 2 picks up right where Part 1 left off. The guys have a few lakes ahead, plus an insane night bite surprise!

programme.title: Two Conchs Sportfishing TV S2:E5 "Ladies, Ladies, Ladies"
programme.desc: Who says fishing is for the boys? This group of ladies is going out with Two Conchs for a few days and showing everyone that fishing isn't just for the men.

programme.title: Two Conchs Sportfishing TV S2:E6 "Yellowfins as Far as You Can See"
programme.desc: When you own a Yellowfin boat, you are part of an elite club. And what better way to spend time with this group of people than the Yellowfin.

programme.title: Team200 S7:E5 "Hunting Giant Bucks by the Moon part 1"
Team200 S7:E6 "Traditional Whitetails part 1"
programme.desc: Part 1 introduction of Wade Fatool and Rick and Rock Bonomo as they chase giant bucks across the Midwest and Canada with traditional archery gear.

programme.title: Local Knowledge S6:E5 "The Slow Pitch"
programme.desc: With slow pitch jigging being the newest craze, Rush and buddy Dane head out to test some new tackle and go for “mutton or nothing.” Meanwhile in California, Ali gets his hand on the new gear and prepares to hop a flight and join in on the “slow pitch” party with the guys in Key West.

programme.title: Local Knowledge S6:E6 "Tails and Teeth"
programme.desc: When the weather in San Diego throws the crew a curveball, Ali, Rush and friend Brandon Nelson put together plan B. Targeting Yellowtail and Mako sharks, the guys search for kelp paddies on the horizon and look to friend at the fish house for some “shark attractant” to make it all come together.

programme.title: Local Knowledge S6:E7 "Shrimp Boats and New Boats"
programme.desc: Fishing with friend Tony Murphy in Key West, the guys head into the Gulf of Mexico to target jumbo sized Bonito behind the shrimp boats. With a brand new boat on the way, Rush hopes to stock up on his prized bait source for the shakedown trip and upcoming charters on the new rig.

programme.title: Sweetwater S7:E5 "Sweetwater Siblings"
programme.desc: The full Sweetwater families take to the waters of Lake County Florida and the Coosa River to share the bond of fishing.

programme.title: Sweetwater S7:E6 "The Legendary Okeechobee"
programme.desc: Fresh off his top 10 finish on Lake Okeechobee, Miles shows Joey where to find some big Florida bass.

programme.title: Spanish Fly E5 "Isla Mujeres pt. 1 - The Crossing" (2008)
Spanish Fly E6 "Flats Fishing w/ Steve Impallomeni" (2008)
Chasing November S5:E5 "River Bottom Bruiser, Massive Ten on Public"
programme.desc: Mike Reed takes advantage of great conditions and tags a bruiser buck on the River Farm. Josh Sparks hunts a new piece of public land finding a massive 10 pointer. Jared Mills encounters the giant for a third time.

programme.title: Chasing November S5:E6 "Iowa Dandy Buck, First Snow Action"
programme.desc: Ty Kehoe encounters multiple shooters, tagging one of his best bucks ever. Bill Winke heads to Northeast Iowa to hunt the farms he grew up on. Owen Reigler encounters a new buck.

programme.title: Chasing November S5:E7 "Rut Crazed Buck, Wisconsin Brute"
programme.desc: Jared Mills harvests a rut crazed buck filling his first landowner tag ever. Elliot Schellpfeffer drills a Wisconsin brute he's had trail cam photos of all season.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 11
programme.desc: It’s already proved to be a rollercoaster at the final table with three players finding themselves in the chip-leading position so far and all six surviving into our second hour of coverage. Off the felt we take a look back at a war of words in one of the best moments from the historic tenth season of WPT and more detailed analysis from resident poker expert Tony Dunst in The Raw Deal. Kimberly Lansing hosts while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten give the sideline commentary at the renowned Borgata Poker Open.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 12
programme.desc: The casino that builds poker superstars has narrowed down the near 1200 starting competitors to the surviving four on the final table that is full of surprises. The third and final hour of WPT’s extended coverage is coming to a climactic conclusion at the Borgata Poker Open which means there’s not long left before an eminent champion is named. Kimberly Lansing anchors the intense competition as Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call all the high stakes action at The Borgata Casino.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 13
programme.desc: The venue where the World Poker Tour phenomenon all started eleven years go hosts the competition in name of a poker legend. Poker’s biggest names have won their titles here and it looks like this year may be no different with a final table stocked full of top level professional quality. Amongst the elite is Antonio “The Magician” Esfandiari, the all-time tournament money leader in poker history, who is up for his third title. Kimberly Lansing anchors the momentous event while in-house poker experts Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten commentate on the action.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 14
programme.desc: Five remain on the final table in the poker event that has played host to the brightest stars in poker history. Cards are ready to fly and the stage is set for the next great poker champion, but will it be another title in one of the veteran’s belts or will the talented amateur snatch up victory for himself? Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten commentate from the booth while Kimberly Lansing hosts the ferocious competition at The Bellagio.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 15
programme.desc: The table stacked full of pros has been narrowed down to four and it is obvious to see how it’s no easy feat to survive with chip counts rising and falling frantically in particular Ravi Raghavan who has goen from short stack to chip-leader. The final hour of WPT’s coverage at the distinguished Five Diamond World Poker Classic is here with more than enough surprises in store to keep you at the edge of your seat. Kimberly Lansing hosts the action with poker experts Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten as pundits in the breathtaking conclusion to this esteemed event.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 16
programme.desc: Season eleven’s biggest prize pool as of yet, at over $4.9 million, has attracted professionals from around the globe to compete in the venerable LA Poker Classic. Competing in the largest card-room in the world with no reentry option players made sure to bring their A-game. Number one online poker player, Paul Volpe, leads the final table in chips but he’ll have to play strategically with all six of the finalist’s eyes on the coveted WPT Champions Cup. Commentators Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten bring you all the heart pounding action from the Commerce Casino.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 17
programme.desc: The battle to take home over one million dollars rages on at the LAPC with five contenders still in the heat. Cash game expert, Danny Fuhs, has already caused upset amongst the pros and is now well out in front but he’ll have to be weary with online master, Paul Volpe, on the table who has set out to prove himself in the live tournament ring. Commentators Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten, along with anchor Kimberly Lansing bring you all the twists and turns in the LA Poker Classic.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 18
programme.desc: The third and final installment of WPT’s coverage at the LAPC is wrapping up with excitement and anticipation bursting through the roof. The chip-counts have risen and fallen all across the table leaving no clear favorite to join the ranks of poker legends of past and claim the prestigious title. Jessica Lansing hosts while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten calls the play at the Commerce Casino.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 19
programme.desc: The unique Bay 101 Shooting Star has returned to play host to a record breaking number of competitors and another star studded field. Players had the opportunity to claim bounties from the top pros’ by busting them making the competition to reach the final table fierce. Though, this wasn’t enough to stop one of top money earners of all time, Erik Seidel, who is joined by two local poker heroes, an internet pro, a cash game expert and back-to-back finalist Paul Volpe who leads the final table in chips a second time in a row. Kimberley Lansing anchors while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call the action.

programme.title: Tom Clark - I'm A Rescue
programme.desc: Tom Clark was born and raised, in that order. Clark’s mix of well-crafted jokes and spontaneous crowd work has led to appearances on TBS’s ‘Conan,’ CBS’s ‘Late Late Show, and Comedy Central’s ‘Premium Blend’. Clark has traveled coast to coast doing stand up and has performed internationally as part of New Faces at the prestigious‘Just For Laughs Comedy Festival’ in Montreal and on The Main Stage at ‘The Capetown Comedy Festival’ in South Africa. Clark is also an actor and has appeared on such shows as NBC’s ‘Outsourced’, TNT’s ‘The Closer’,and the Hallmark made for TV movie ‘The Wish List’. After landing the role on ‘Outsourced,’ director Ken Kwapis invited Clark to be in the Drew Barrymore movie, ‘Big Miracle’. You can also see Clark in Columbia Pictures ‘Freaks of Nature.’

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Paul Morrissey - A Real Humdinger
programme.desc: Paul was raised as a sports fanatic in the tiny town of Owego, in upstate New York. After four years of playing college basketball, somehow he graduated. Aside from playing in the NBA, his dream job was to talk about sports for a living. Paul then moved to California after landing a television sports anchor job but found out quickly that he was “too much of a smart-ass” for TV news. After he was fired, Paul took his unique sense of humor to comedy club stages all over the country. In 2005, Paul was selected to perform at the HBO Comedy Festival in Las Vegas. Morrissey has also been a finalist in several national comedy competitions including Wendy’s Comedy Challenge, Comedy Central’s Open Mic Fight and Maxim’s Real Men of Comedy.

programme.title: Rik Roberts - Put Down the Sweet Tea
programme.desc: Rik Roberts brings a little bit of Nashville everywhere he goes. From quick bits about family and technology, to surprising stories about marriage and music – you’ll find something you can relate to. Growing up in Kentucky, he got his hands dirty working

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Jesse Egan - That's the Spirit
programme.desc: San Diego native Jesse Egan jokes about hitting on women in a smart car, hippie drive-bys, and the gluten free craze.

programme.title: Buddy Fitzpatrick - Still in the Driveway
programme.desc: BUDDY FITZPATRICK, a native of Philadelphia, is currently a New York City club favorite sharing his comedy perspective. His act combines the skill of a great monologist with a physical style that brings his observations to life. At the age of 18, he left

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Robert Mac - Back to Lake Titicaca
programme.desc: Robert Mac returns to the Dry Bar stage with less smartness, less subtleness, and even more silliness.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Josh Novey - Tickling Grizzlies
programme.desc: Iraq War veteran Josh Novey takes the stage with an easy-going presence and jokes about Waffle House, kindly threatening his audience, and tickling grizzly bears.

programme.title: Alex Velluto - Spurious
programme.desc: Like Rocky Balboa, Alex Velluto is the son of an Italian immigrant and brings the same intensity, will, and drive to the comedy stage. In 2016, Alex was voted 'Best Comedian' by City Weekly Magazine and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. Alex is a regular at Wiseguys Comedy Club where he has headlined and worked with some of the biggest names in comedy. He has also “gone the distance” in many competitions and festivals across the country. Alex was a finalist in the the Funniest Person in Utah competition, and The Salt Lake Comedy Festival stand up competition, has performed at the Idaho Laugh Festival, and Finger Lakes Comedy Festival. In addition to his stand-up comedy, Alex is a co-host of the "Happy Valley Podcast", and is renowned for referring to himself in the third person, and is an excellent writer of comedy bios about himself that everybody likes.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Orlando Baxter - Glorified Baby Sitter
programme.desc: Orlando Baxter's fresh perspective and unique relatability makes this former high school teacher a fan favorite all over the world. In 2016, Orlando made his late night TV debut on the Conan show on TBS, and since then he's appeared on the television shows "Comedy Up Late" in Australia, B.E.T.'s "50 Central" and Laff Mobb's Laff Track on Tru TV.

programme.title: Byron Trimble - Diary of a Short City Boy
programme.desc: Byron Trimble has traveled around the world doing comedy for conferences, churches, retreats, clubs, schools, and corporate events. He has been featured on NBC, ABC, Living Oklahoma, and the Dan Patrick Show. His hilarious blend of music and comedy in his live shows and the following generated by his online videos have enabled him to share the stage with nationally known comedians like John Crist and Anita Renfroe. Raised in Detroit, MI, he now lives in Tulsa, OK with his beautiful wife, Hannah, and three young children. Yet, he says his greatest success might be being a pastors kid his whole life and never being arrested.

programme.title: Kristin Key - Crafty
programme.desc: Kristin Key grew up a minister’s daughter in a small town in West Texas. Much like Footloose, she was raised in a no-drinking, no-dancing, no instrumental music environment. She seemed like any other well-behaved girl… until she opened her mouth. It was obvious from the beginning that she had a quick wit and undeniable sense of humor.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Dave Nihill - Documented
programme.desc: Dave is the winner of the prestigious 43rd annual San Francisco Comedy Competition, and runner up in the Moth’s largest US Grandslam storytelling competition.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:K-Von - Designer Muscles
programme.desc: Half-Persian and raised in a religious family, K-Von's comedy unites sharp cultural riffs with clean delivery. In this special he takes on political correctness, cyber bullying, and the utility of cargo pants.

programme.title: Chad Thornsberry - Junk-Cars & Valet Parking
programme.desc: Chad Thornsberry was born in St. Louis, MO. From an early age he learned his family was blessed, and blessed him with humor, quick wit, and a love of storytelling. Chad’s unique comedic perspective awards audience the opportunity to laugh at the common occurrences in everyday life. Often referred to as a great writer, his straightforward style allows audiences to laugh with him and at him as they find the humor in themselves. With reflections on growing up in a trailer park and observations as an English teacher, Chad’s satiric insights look at the pitfalls that make us human. With smart humor and a conversational style, Chad has delighted audiences from the trailer park, throughout the Midwest, and from coast to coast.

programme.title: We Used to Eat Animals the Right Way - Here's What Changed
programme.desc: Dr. Bill Schindler explains why the processes we have in place today in the food industry lead to a less healthy and enriched lifestyle. The way humans eat animals has shifted. Our brains grew significantly once the human race started hunting its food. Diets that consisted of blood, guts, and organs contributed to that growth. These parts of animals are almost completely absent from modern day diets and these provided much more nutrition than just the animal's meat.
